task.title: Setting Up Daily Reminders
task.shortdesc: How to set daily reminders on BreakBuddy.

taskbody.context: These steps show you how to set up the frequency of your daily reminders for BreakBuddy. The app sends you reminders based on your selected schedule.

step.cmd: Open the Break Schedule tab from the main dashboard.
Select the Start Time and End Time for your daily breaks.
Chose the Frequency of reminders (every hour, every 90 minutes).
